# LegibilityWeight.bold

**Case**

Use heavier font weight (force Accessibility Bold).

## Declaration

```swift
case bold
```

## Getting weights

- **LegibilityWeight.regular**: Use regular font weight (no Accessibility Bold).

items.description: Use regular font weight (no Accessibility Bold).
items.name: LegibilityWeight.regular

title: LegibilityWeight.bold
